price: Na wakikujadili basi sema: Mwenyezi Mungu anajua zaidi mnayo yatenda.
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ
footnotes: Na wakishikilia kuendea kukujadili basi waachilie mbali, na waambie: Mwenyezi Mungu anajua zaidi vitendo vyenu, na malipo mnayo yastahiki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
